name: Odd Island
description:
1. Odd Island
Odd Island describes the adventure of cute and small Chibi to win the Badge at the end of the beautiful island. Chibi faces tremendous amounts of battles with cute bosses in the adventure under limited time. Odd Island is Hold & Gun and Boss Rush type game. You can feel like in the unlimited battles, and at the end you will win the badge!



2. About this game
Hardcore action, Hold & Gun, Limited time!
Odd Island is Hold & Gun and Boss Rush type game. You must finish the adventure of Chibi in a limited time, so you can enjoy extremely fast pace in fighting with bosses. Chibi need to defeat the lots of bosses to advance to the end of the island and to earn the badge.



Hardcore action in the extreme difficulty!
Odd Island’s battles are always in a very fast pace with the extreme difficulty. Chibi must get over bullet and sorcery in the battles with your battle skill. When you defeat all of the cute bosses, you can advance to the end of island and win the badge!



Lots of Bosses!
You can meet many and many bosses shown in the game randomly. They are colorful and pretty cute. This will enhance your fun in Odd Island.
